text: Daredevil is a 2003 video game based on the 2003 movie of the same name. It was released for the Game Boy Advance. ==Gameplay== Unlike the movie, Daredevil encounters other villains including Kirigi and Echo. Stick, the mentor figure in the comics helps Daredevil throughout the game. ==Reception== The game had mixed reviews. title: Daredevil (video game)
